RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT A.CONTRACT_REF_NO, A.USER_REF_NO, A.PRODUCT_CODE, A.COUNTERPARTY, A.CONTRACT_CCY, A.LATEST_EVENT_SEQ_NO, B.PRINCIPAL_OUTSTANDING_BAL, D.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION, F.SHORT_NAME FROM OLTBS_CONTRACT A, OLTBS_CONTRACT_BALANCE B, OLTBS_CONTRACT_MASTER G, OLTMS_PRODUCT D, OLTMS_CUSTOMER F WHERE A.CONTRACT_REF_NO = G.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND A.LATEST_VERSION_NO = G.VERSION_NO AND A.CONTRACT_STATUS = 'A' AND A.PRODUCT_TYPE = 'L' AND A.MODULE_CODE = 'OL' AND A.CONTRACT_REF_NO = B.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND A.PRODUCT_CODE = D.PRODUCT_CODE AND A.COUNTERPARTY = F.CUSTOMER_NO /*AND G.ROLLOVER_ALLOWED = 'N'*/ AND (EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM OLTM_PRODUCT_MASTER_LD P WHERE P.PRODUCT = A.PRODUCT_CODE AND P.PAYMENT_METHOD = 'B' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM LFTMS_PRODUCT_ICCF I WHERE I.PRODUCT = A.PRODUCT_CODE AND I.RATE_TYPE = 'S' AND I.SHOWN_IN_CONTRACT_MAIN_SCREEN = 'Y')) /*LSDiscount BA changes start*/ OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM OLTM_PRODUCT_MASTER_LD r WHERE r.product = a.product_code AND r.payment_method IN ('T', 'D') AND (banker_acceptance = 'Y' OR (EXISTS((SELECT 1 FROM OLTB_CONTRACT_PREFERENCE K WHERE K.CONTRACT_REF_NO = A.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND DISCOUNTED_SCH = 'Y' AND VERSION_NO = (SELECT MAX(VERSION_NO) FROM OLTB_CONTRACT_PREFERENCE R WHERE R.CONTRACT_REF_NO = A.CONTRACT_REF_NO))))))) /*LSDiscount BA changes end*/ AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM OLTBS_CONTRACT_MERGE_MASTER M WHERE M.CONTRACT_REF_NO = A.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND M.AUTH_STAT = 'A' AND M.MERGE_STATUS = 'U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM OLTBS_CONTRACT_MERGE_MASTER M, OLTBS_CONTRACT_MERGE_DETAIL D WHERE M.AUTH_STAT = 'A' AND M.MERGE_STATUS = 'U' AND M.CONTRACT_REF_NO = D.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND D.CHILD_REF_NO = A.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND D.CHILD_STATUS = 'U' AND M.MERGE_SERIAL_NO = D.MERGE_SERIAL_NO)

SELECT A.PRODUCT_CODE, PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION FROM OLTMS_PRODUCT A, OLVW_AVL_PROD_BR_USR B WHERE A.MODULE = 'OL' AND A.PRODUCT_CODE = B.PRODUCT_CODE AND A.ONCE_AUTH = 'Y' AND B.BRANCH_CODE = sypks_utils.get_branch(?) AND B.USER_ID = GLOBAL.USER_ID AND A.PRODUCT_CODE IN (SELECT PRODUCT FROM OLTMS_PRODUCT_MASTER_LD WHERE PRODUCT_TYPE = 'L' AND REPRICE_PRODUCT = 'Y' /* DISCOUNTED SCHEDULE CHANGES \*LSDiscount BA Changes starts*\ UNION SELECT PRODUCT FROM OLTMS_PRODUCT_MASTER_LD WHERE PRODUCT_TYPE = 'L' AND PAYMENT_METHOD IN ('T', 'D') AND BANKER_ACCEPTANCE = 'Y' \*LSDiscount BA Changes ends*\DISCOUNTED SCHEDULE CHANGES*/) ORDER BY A.PRODUCT_CODE

SELECT DISTINCT A.RATE_CODE, A.RATE_DESCR FROM CFTMS_RATE_CODE A, CFTMS_FLOAT_RATE_MASTER B WHERE A.RATE_CODE = B.RATE_CODE AND A.RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND A.AUTH_STAT = 'A' AND B.CCY_CODE = ? AND A.BRANCH_CODE = sypks_utils.get_branch(?) AND A.BRANCH_CODE = B.BRANCH_CODE AND 'F' = ? UNION SELECT RATE_CODE,RATE_CODE_DESC FROM LFTMS_STANDARD_RATE_CODE WHERE RATE_TYPE='S' AND RECORD_STAT='O' AND AUTH_STAT='A' AND 'X' = ? UNION SELECT DISTINCT RATE_CODE, RATE_DESCR FROM CFTMS_RFR_MASTER WHERE RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND AUTH_STAT = 'A'
SELECT FIELD_NAME, FIELD_DESC FROM OLTMS_STATIC_FIELD_VALS WHERE FIELD_TYPE = 'BA' and field_name ='BAPRODUCT' AND RECORD_STAT = 'O'AND AUTH_STAT = 'A'

RAD_DATASOURCES.RELATION_WITH_PARENT: OLTBS_SPLIT_PRODUCT_INTCOMPS.CONTRACT_REF_NO=LFTB_CONT_ADDL_INT_DTL.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND OLTBS_SPLIT_PRODUCT_INTCOMPS.SPLIT_SERIAL_NO=LFTB_CONT_ADDL_INT_DTL.SPLIT_SERIAL_NO AND OLTBS_SPLIT_PRODUCT_INTCOMPS.PRODUCT_CODE=LFTB_CONT_ADDL_INT_DTL.PRODUCT_CODE AND OLTBS_CONTRACT_SPLIT_DETAIL.SERIAL_NO=LFTB_CONT_ADDL_INT_DTL.SERIAL_NO AND OLTBS_SPLIT_PRODUCT_INTCOMPS.COMPONENT = LFTB_CONT_ADDL_INT_DTL.COMPONENT
